mapper.select: SELECT em.real_name AS NAME, em.role_code AS ROLE, dm.personal_home_url AS personalHomeUrl FROM employee_msg em LEFT JOIN designer_msg dm ON em.user_id = dm.user_id WHERE em.user_id =#{ userId }

SELECT em.user_id as userId, em.real_name AS NAME, em.role_code AS ROLE, dm.personal_home_url AS personalHomeUrl FROM order_user ou LEFT JOIN employee_msg em ON ou.user_id = em.user_id LEFT JOIN designer_msg dm ON em.user_id = dm.user_id WHERE em.user_id =#{ userId }
